website_summaries.verdict: Comes as a complete set for additional storage and organization.
pros: Six-piece set includes carrying bag, cooler, wet bag, dry cloth, accessories pouch, and motivational handbook
Included cooler will keep bottles and storage bags at the right temperature for consumption
Cooler bag fits  four milk bottles or 6-8 storage bags
cons: Difficult to fit all of the additional bags with some larger portable pumps

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Took a chance on this bag based on reviews and the fact that it was mid range for pumping bag prices. I adore the bag! Thoughtful design and pockets and it's comfortable to carry. Love that I can fit other things besides pumping accessories which makes it a perfect work bag. I just carry this and a lunchbox instead of three different bag every day. I do wish the zipper completely sealed the bag instead of having openings on either side but that's my only complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Frequentbuyermiles

customer_reviews.title: I can't say enough how much I love this bag
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough how much I love this bag!!! Its perfect for my SpeCtra pump and keeps my liquid gold cool in the cooler bag that comes with it. Love love love it!!! Its also comfy to hold and can be used as purse also 👍
customer_reviews.author: Selena

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need - just add pump!
customer_reviews.text: Love this tote! I use it for my Spectra 2 pump and accessories. I was using a Medela PIS booksack that didn't fit my Spectra well. Plus I wanted a tote over a backpack style. After shopping around and seeing the more expensive options, i'm glad I went with this tote. It's not too big, lightweight, material is easy to clean, so many pockets, has dividers inside for pump and cooler bag and includes so many extras! I love the wet bag, the cooler bag, the mesh bag and the cleaning cloth. Everything I needed was included for half the price of other bags. Just add pump & handsfree bra!
customer_reviews.author: MPaine82

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this bag!
customer_reviews.text: I searched around a lot for a bag that would fit my needs- and this is it! It holds my pump, with easy access so I don’t constantknhave to unpack it- holds my pump stuff, hooder-hider, an extra cooler answer my baby blanket/spare clothes! It’s easy to clean- looks great and is light weight!
customer_reviews.author: JennaWeise

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic bag! As a first time working mom I’m figuring things out as I go, and this bag has everything I didn’t know I needed all in one place. Perfect pockets, great (opaque!) bags for parts and bottles to go in the fridge, and looks attractive and professional. The bag itself is lightweight and stands up in its own when the pockets are loaded but pump, bottles, etc. are out. All I could ask for and more!
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. It has everything you need for pumping. Wish the design was cuter but it’s gets the job done. I love the size zipper and the little cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product! Beautiful bag and very easy to transport ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! Beautiful bag and very easy to transport pump parts to and from work. Great bag for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jenelle Avalos

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in a timely manner and is working out great
customer_reviews.author: Ann L. Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Not big enough
customer_reviews.text: While all the accessories are nice, this bag just looked a little cheap. I felt like the straps would not age well, and it wasn't big enough for everything that I need to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Heather HS

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely in love with my bag (black) it is beyond perfect
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely in love with my bag (black) it is beyond perfect! I have a spectra S1 and it fits just fine. I love how big and storageable it is.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Not the right product
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the type a and received the navy bag. Seems like a great bag but when you spend 130 on a bag and need it immediately and pay extra for 1 day shipping... you expect to receive what you ordered
customer_reviews.author: Laura Parks

customer_reviews.title: This bag is great! I bought it for going back to work
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great! I bought it for going back to work, to use with my Spectra S1. Before, I was using 2 separate bags to carry all my pumping stuff, along with taking my purse, and another work bag (I'm a teacher and tend to carry a ton of stuff). Now I can use just this one for all my pumping things. It fits my pump, parts, and cooler nicely, and I still have room to carry snacks, water bottle and/or lunch. It has various pockets which are very handy as well. The cooler is very well insulated to keep the milk cool all day long (7+) hours (with the use of an ice pack or two).
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Expensive and falls apart
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag, received as a baby shower gift off Amazon. Love the size and ease of use. Would have given a 5 until I saw the bag ripping at the seams today. I haven't gone back to work yet so it has only been used about 10 times so it will obviously not hold up well when I start to use it more at work. Very disappointed for a $80 bag!
customer_reviews.author: co

customer_reviews.title: The Navy looks great but...
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great because it's a decent size, includes all the essentials you'll need for the accessories, and looks great (I got the navy). However, I ended up returning it because the Charlie G New Yorker bag was much bigger, allowing me to carry my laptop AND lunch tote in the same bag. I debated between the two because the Charlie G bag was more expensive AND it did not include any of the extras, such as the cooler or wet/dry bag. Ultimately, I preferred to carry only 1 bag to work as opposed to multiple, even though I had to buy a separate cooler and wet/dry bag.
customer_reviews.author: Spatel

customer_reviews.title: The size of the bag is perfect – multi-functional for pumping and holding all my purse ...
customer_reviews.text: Loving this stylish bag! It is functional and discreet. The size of the bag is perfect – multi-functional for pumping and holding all my purse belongings too! All of the accessories come together perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: jay elle by J.L. Childress Breast Pump Bag 6-Piece Set (Type A)
product_meta.description: The jay elle Breast Pump Bag 6 Piece Set helps you carry and organize your breast pump and accessories. Includes a Carry Bag, Cooler Bag, Wet Bag, Accessories Bag, Dry Cloth and jay elle C.O.D.E. Handbook. The Carry Bag offers classic style with a hint of sophistication, and always provides ultimate discretion. Size: 16"w x 6"d x 12"h. Carry Bag features black nylon with black faux leather accents, shoulder carry handles, small and large exterior zippered pockets, wipeable and water resistant exterior and zippered breast pump access flap. Carry Bag interior features wipeable and water-resistant fabric, removable divider (separates pump side from cooler side and can be removed so Carry Bag acts like a purse), two large elastic pockets, small zippered pocket, pen pocket and pocket for the jay elle C.O.D.E. Handbook. Cooler Bag is insulated with interior mesh pocket for ice pack or accessories, wipeable PEVA interior and adjustable dividers that make it perfect for storing milk bottles AND milk storage bags, keeping them upright to mitigate spills. Cooler Bag fits four milk bottles (5oz or 8oz) and/or 6-8 storage bags. Exterior of Cooler Bag features webbing carry handle, ID card pocket and water-resistant, easy to clean black nylon. Size: 6"w x 6"d x 5"h. Our Wet Bag is heat-sealed and leak-proof, perfect for storing or transporting wet accessories. Wet Bag features interior PEVA lining, zippered top closure, wrist strap and exterior ID card pocket! The Wet Bag's exterior black nylon is water resistant and easy to wipe clean. Size: 8"w x 10"h. The multi-purpose mesh Accessories Bag includes a lockable drawstring closure. Size: 7.5"w x 9"h. Our absorbent cotton Dry Cloth helps clean up spills and can be used as a lap barrier to protect clothing. Size: 10"w x 10"h. The jay elle C.O.D.E. Handbook includes words of encouragement, helpful tips, milk storage guidelines, a checklist and more!
feature_bullets: Not just a breast pump bag - this stylish and discreet 6-piece set includes the Carry Bag, Cooler, Wet Bag, Accessories Pouch, Dry Cloth and motivational jay elle C.O.D.E. handbook
Innovative cooler fits bottles or breastmilk storage bags and features adjustable dividers to keep storage bags upright
Designed by two working and breastfeeding moms and sisters. We've experienced the struggles and triumphs of pumping while away from our babies and were inspired to create a line of products to help.
The Type A bag is made of black nylon with pebbled vegan-leather handles and trim, and includes a nylon, water-resistant and wipeable interior
For every breast pump bag purchased, one dollar will be donated to support breastfeeding moms
